## Session Overview

In this session, you'll pin up a draft version of your MUP poster for review and feedback from the Planning at Illinois community. Please come prepared to both give and recieve feedback on your poster.

## Before we Meet

Print a draft version of your MUP poster. Be prepared to pin up this poster at the very beginning of our meeting time.

## After we Meet

Take the feedback you recieved on your draft to refine and prepare your final MUP poster for presentation at our end of the year celebration.
